member.name: M:Centralized_DB_Sync.Centralized_DB_Sync.CDB_Sync.GetHome(System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: If the plugin should have it's own button on the main menu of MediaPortal then it should return true to this method, otherwise if it should not be on home it should return false
member.param: image for the button, or empty for default
image for the button, or empty for default
subpicture for the button or empty for none
member.returns: true : plugin needs it's own button on home false : plugin does not need it's own button on home
